article.headline: Sam Houston St. 85, Texas College 49
article.story: HUNTSVILLE, Texas (AP) -- Ryan Bright scored 12 points and had a game-high nine rebounds to lead Sam Houston State to an 85-49 victory over Texas College on Tuesday night. Aaron Wade added 11 points for the Bearkats (4-1) and Reggie Rawlins added 10. Jejuan Plair had a game-high six assists. The Bearkats led 40-20 at halftime and scored 27 points off 21 Texas College turnovers. Mario Kersey, who entered the game averaging 21.6 points, led Texas College (2-5) with nine points. Ronald Tolbert shot 2-of-4 from 3-point range, and Shoko Crowley added the team's only other 3-pointer. The Bearkats shot 51 percent from the field, and Texas College shot 30 percent.
